verses.content: Manasse chu ân lal ṭantir chun kum sâwm le kum hni mi a nih; Jerusalemah kum sâwmnga le kum nga ân lal a, a nu hming chu Heph- ziba a nih.
Chun, LALPAIN Israel thlahai hmaa a hnawtsuok tah, hnamhaiin thil tirdakumtak an thaw hlak ang, LALPA mithmuah thil ṭha nawtakhai chu a thaw hlak a.
A pa Hezekiain a suksiet tah bâwlhmunhai chu a siem ṭha nâwk a; Israel lal Ahab thaw angin Baal mâichâmhai a siem a, Aserahai a siem a, vâna um po po khi a biek a, an rawng a bâwl a.
LALPAIN, “Jerusalemah ka hming inumtir ka tih,” a tina, LALPA ina chun mâichâmhai a siem a.
LALPA in inhuonna sûng pahnia chun vâna um po pohai ta dingin mâichâm a siem a.

Chun, a naupa chu meiah ân lûttir a, aisân dâm a chîng a, dawi dâm a hmang a, khawhri aisân thiem zâwlhai le dawithiemhai a ruoi hlak a; LALPA mithmuah thil ṭha naw- tak ama suklungsen dingin a thaw hlak a.
Chun, LALPAIN David le a naupa Solomon kuoma, “Hi in le Jerusalem khuo, Israel chihai po po laia ka ithlanga hin, ka hming chu kumkhuoin inumtir ka ta;

thu ka pêk ang po le, ka siehlaw Mosien dân a pêk ang po po kha an pawm phawt chun an pi le puhai ka pêk tah rama inthawkin Israelhai kehai khawm hi inpên suoktir ta bawk naw ning,” a lo ti tah ina chun Asera lim a siem chu a sieh a.
Nisienlakhawm, an pawm nuom nawh a, LALPAIN Israel thlahai hmaa a hnawt suok tah hnamhai thaw nêk hmana nasa lem thil suksuol dingin Manasse chun mihai a thlêm thlûk hlak a.
Chun, LALPAIN a siehlaw zâwlneihai hmangin thu a hril a,
“Juda lal Manasse hin hieng thil tirdakumtakhai hi a thawh a, a hmaa Amor mihai nêk hmanin a suksuol nasa a, Judahai hi a milimhaiin thil ân suksuoltir leiin:
LALPA, Israelhai Pathienin hieng ang hin a tih, ‘Ngai ta u, Jerusalem le Juda chunga hin a hre taphawthai na khing hni ṭhâwng khawp thil ṭha naw ka hung in- tlungtir ding a nih.
Samari inkhina hrui le Ahab sûngkuo dârmûmkhai chu Jerusalem chungah keimar ka tih; chun, miin thlêng a hrûk a, ân let vêl angin Jerusalem chu hrûng ka tih.
Chun, ka rochan a la um sunhai chu pei thlâng ka ta, an hmêlmahai kutah pêng ka ta; an hmêlmahai po po man ding le râllâk ding nîng an tih,
an pi le puhai Aigupta rama an hung suoka inthawka vawisûn ni chen hin ka mithmuah thil ṭha naw- tak an thaw a, an mi suklungsen lei hin,’ tiin,” a ta.
LALPA mithmua thil ṭha naw- tak thawa Judahai thil ân suksuoltir a suolna tiem loin, Manasse chun pawi tâwklo thisen nasatakin ân suo bawk a, Jerusalem dung le khang chu a sip a.
Chuongchun, Manasse chan- chin danghai a thilthaw po pohai, a thil suksuolhai chu Juda lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chun, Manasse chu a pi le puhai kuoma chun a in a, Uzza huona ama in bul huonah an phûm tah a; chuongchun, a naupa Amon chu ama aiawin ân lal tah a.
Amon chu ân lal ṭantir chun kum sâwmhni le kum hni a na; Jerusalema chun kum hni ân lal a; a nu hming chu Mesullemet, Jotba khuoa Haruz naunu a nih.
Chun, a pa Manasse thaw ang bawkin LALPA mithmuah thil ṭha nawtak a thaw hlak a.
A pa lampui hraw po po chu a hraw veh a, a pain milim rawng a bâwlhai chu a bâwl veh a, chibai a bûk a;
chuongchun, LALPA, a pi le puhai Pathien chu a mâksan a, LALPA lampui chu a hraw nawh a.
Chun, a mihaiin Amon chu an phier rûk a, lal chu ama in ngeia chun an that a.
Nisienlakhawm, chu rama mihai chun lal Amon phier rutuhai po po chu an sukhlum ve ta vawng a; chu rama mihai chun a naupa Josia chu a aiawin lalah an siem tah a.
Chun, Amon thilthaw danghai chu Juda lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna bua chun a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chun, Uzza huonah ama thlân- ah an phûm a, chun, a naupa Josia chu ama aiawin ân lal tah a.
